post:
We have two specials available for LEB:

**$12/yr 256MB**

15 GB RAID10 Protected Storage
256 MB Guaranteed RAM
500 GB Monthly Bandwidth
100Mbps Port
1 IPv4 Address
Instant Setup
SolusVM/OpenVZ

We are proud to say we are the only LEB provider offering such vast resources all at the $12/yr pricepoint, and the only provider offering it in 3 different Geographically Diverse locations!

Available in:
- Los Angeles, CA
- Dallas, TX
- Buffalo, NY

Price: $12/Year - order link: https://billing.urpad.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=176

**$7/m 2GB**

60 GB RAID10 Protected Storage
2048 MB Guaranteed RAM
2000 GB (2TB) Bandwidth
100Mbps Port
1 IPv4 Address
Instant Setup
SolusVM/OpenVZ

Location Choices:
- Los Angeles, CA
- Dallas, TX
- Buffalo, NY
- Hafnarfjordur, Iceland (250GB BW)

Please note, due with the unique location and its increased bandwidth costs, Iceland receives 250GB monthly bandwidth on the above $7/m plan. All other locations will receive 2 TB bandwidth.

Price: $7/Month - order link: https://billing.urpad.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=219

**Network Test:**

- Los Angeles, CA – QuadraNet Datacenter – Test IP: 98.143.159.202
- Dallas, TX - Colo4 Datacenter - Test IP: 198.12.71.130
- Buffalo, NY - ColoCrossing's Datacenter - Test IP: 198.23.150.2
- Hafnarfjordur, Iceland – ThorDC DataCenter – Test IP: 193.107.84.20
